response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item offers unparalleled value and quality, making it an investment that could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. Considering its outstanding features and the time and resources we've dedicated to its development, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a piece that is not only valuable but also holds the potential to contribute to your success. I look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this remarkable product into your life. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 750000}
